entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
